cab.content: This Document i*5 the Property ofHis Britannic Majestys Government.b.P../Secret.1257MR. C. LUNGHURST.3i Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of Slate for India,7th January 1920.(Received 15th.)7th January. Your telegram of the 11th ultimo, 4851. Malleson againurges importance of having aeroplanes with his force, and in -view of recent and possible future developments we strongly support his request. We are prepared toundertake provision of petrol and oil, and will arrange transit of machines and personnel if you can arrange for provision of latter. Earliest possible information required to permit of arrangements being made.139
